title: JSON Agents Extension Registry
description: Canonical registry of recognized and reusable extension namespaces (x-*).

extensions.description: Adds configurable auditing and log retention to agents.
Defines persistent or episodic memory storage and recall behavior.
Experimental namespace for academic or prototype fields.
Optional embedding provider configuration for models using vectorization.

notes.policy: All extensions must begin with `x-` and should be registered if reused across projects.
notes.validation: Manifests and validators must ignore unknown `x-*` extensions gracefully.
notes.future: Registry entries may include provenance and digital signatures for verified authorship.
